messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] lipstick
messages.msgSnippet: Okay...I happy that I didn t offend you. Janis ... From: Ren To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com Sent: Thursday, October 16, 2003 11:02 PM Subject:
messages.messageBody:
Okay...I happy that I didn't offend you.
Janis
----- Original Message -----
From: Ren
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, October 16, 2003 11:02 PM
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] lipstick



Janis...I didn't mean to sound like I was offended, not the case at all!:)
I just hate those damn emails that either proclaim the sky is falling or perpetuate some untruth. That's all.
And I love being an artist, I'd be really sad to put lead on someones lips. hehe

Ren
